Foundation <security@enzyme.finance>","details":"Share price loss is tracked: - cumulatively (additive between subsequent txs) - relatively (as a percentage) - with a replenishing tolerance (based on time since last loss) This contract is version-agnostic, so long as the FundValueCalculatorRouter supports the fund's current version. Note that the FundValueCalculatorRouter is meant mostly for off-chain consumption (due to gas costs), but its gross share value functions are
